definitions.definition: A cultural region in Western Asia inhabited mostly by the Kurds , encompassing parts of Turkey , Iraq , Iran and Syria .
An autonomous region in northern and northeastern Iraq , lying within the aforementioned Kurdish-majority region.
A province in northwestern Iran , lying within the aforementioned Kurdish-majority region.

main_definition: A cultural region in Western Asia inhabited mostly by the Kurds , encompassing parts of Turkey , Iraq , Iran and Syria .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) An autonomous region in northern and northeastern Iraq , lying within the aforementioned Kurdish-majority region.
( by extension ) A province in northwestern Iran , lying within the aforementioned Kurdish-majority region.
